FuncDef:
The qos scheduling-mode command configures LNS scheduling mode.
The undo qos scheduling-mode command restores the default setting.
By default, the scheduling is done based on tunnels.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the L2TP HQoS scheduling is done based on sessions.
-

Indicates that the L2TP HQoS scheduling is done based on tunnels.
-

ExtraInfo:
The L2TP HQoS has the following two scheduling modes:
Schedule based on tunnels: Sessions for an L2TP tunnel are scheduled uniformly. A maximum of eight priorities and SP and WFQ scheduling modes are supported.Schedule based on sessions: Packets of each session are scheduled separately and are in a single queue. A maximum of eight priorities and SP and WFQ scheduling modes are supported.
